excerpt.rendered: Our UTV Rentals and Whitewater Rafting package allows you to ride across Colorado’s great outdoors, kick up some mud, and then wash it all off out on the water. This package includes a 2-hour ride on our RZR Turbo side-by-side rental combined with our half-day scenic float trip. Both exciting adventures will take place from our Kremmling, Colorado outpost.
